high_descs: Stand up turn around walk towards the sink.
Pick up the plate nearer to the sink.
Turn around walk towards the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the plate nearer to the sink and turn on the desk lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and head straight, then proceed to turn left towards the table.
Pick up plate from the table .
Head towards the door, then hang a left and go to the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a plate by the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: Turn around  living room and walk to the sink
take up the plate which is near the sink
take plate and move towards bedroom table near desk lamp
while holding a plate turn on the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: grab the plate from the sink, proceed to the bedroom table, and turn on the desk lamp
